sorular.soru: Which drivers should you expect on the carriageway here?

feedback.metin:
There is a non-mandatory cycle path next to the carriageway. Cyclists are allowed to use that path, but that is not mandatory. They may choose between the carriageway and the cycle path. 
Snorfietsers
 are only allowed on the non-mandatory cycle path with their combustion engine turned off. Other drivers are not allowed on this path. Because the path is non-mandatory, you should expect all listed drivers on the carriageway.
